title: Sheboygan-StyleÂ Bratwurst
directions: Cut the pork butt, veal or beef, and fatback into 1/2- to 3/4-inch cubes and chill thoroughly. It helps to have the meat partially frozen to prevent the fat from smearing.
Grind the meat in small batches using a meat grinder fitted with a 3/16-inch plate.
Combine the meat in a bowl with the spices. Mix thoroughly and refrigerate.
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds pork butt, fat trimmed and discarded
1 pound veal shoulder or beef hanger steak, fat trimmed and discarded
